author: Simon Difford
description: When made correctly, this pale-pink cocktail has a perfect balance between the fruit flavours and the spirit of the rum.
name: Mary Pickford Cocktail
recipeIngredient: 60 ml White/gold 1-3 year old mellow light rum

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass

video.description: When made correctly, this pale-pink cocktail has a perfect balance between the fruit flavours and the spirit of the rum.
video.name: HOWTO make Mary Pickford Cocktail
